hero.title: Graphic Design
hero.description: I consider myself a creative person who sees my failures as steps towards success. I am responsible and detail-oriented, specialized in branding, editorial design, and social media.

portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.description: A selection of my best work in graphic design, branding, editorial, and social media.

items.title: Corporate Branding
items.description: Development of complete corporate identity, including logo, color palette, typography, and brand applications.

items.title: Social Media Campaign
items.description: Development of social media campaign, including post design, stories, and promotional banners.

items.title: Editorial Design
items.description: Design and layout of catalogs and manuals, including cover, back cover, and interior pages.

items.title: Web Design
items.description: Design of web banners and graphic elements for corporate website.

items.title: Textile Design
items.description: Design of patterns and graphics for application on textile products.

items.title: Visual Identity
items.description: Development of logo and visual identity system for company.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: These are the tools and skills I have perfected throughout my career as a graphic designer.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.description: My professional journey in the world of graphic design.

items.title: Design Coordinator
items.description: Development of content for social media, catalogs, banners, logos, branding, and flyers.

items.title: Graphic Designer
items.description: Creation of content for social media, logos, flyers, web banners, branding, and community management.

items.title: Design Coordinator
items.description: Social media management, design of catalogs, manuals, branding development, logos, and flyers.

items.title: Freelancer
items.description: Development of content for social media, creation of logos and branding for various clients.

items.title: Designer
items.description: Development of branding, textile design, catalogs, banners, and content for social media.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Do you have a project in mind? Contact me and let's talk about how I can help you.
